RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 9700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 9, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 9, 2022 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPTAIN SAM hustled clear leaving the chute and angled in to rate the pace, was urged away at the rail on the turn, driven into the stretch and steadily handled to the wire. SECRET AFFIRMATION chased outside through the backstretch, rounded the turn in the three path and proved no match in the lane. CHIT CHAT GIRL chased the leaders through the backstretch, eased outward on the turn and left the turn widest, finished well for third later yards and was gaining on the runner-up. MARY'S LISTED NEXT chased the pace, rounded the turn about the four path then flattened in the lane. ADABEL chased toward the inside, raced near the rail on the turn then flattened in the lane. MS BIG SPRING chased the pace inside but steadied from tight quarters at the rail nearing the quarter pole and weakened on the turn. LIL SWEETHEART chased then weakened while saving ground on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled clear,rated pace,urged away rail turn,steadily handled

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LETITGOTOVOICEMAIL closed to the lead toward the three quarter pole and angled to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure at the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail and was kept alert through the stretch. SIDESWIPED stalked off the rail on the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn in the three path and had to settle for second best. BLONDE SAMARITAN saved ground on the first turn, gave chase approaching the three eighths pole and raced in the six path of the far turn, left the turn outside and came along for third the final strides. PERFECT PRINCESS rounded the opening turn about the four path, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced near the rail on the far turn and weakened in the lane. SHE'S MYBUDDYBUDDY settled back two deep on the first turn and showed little response through the backstretch. COWGIRL HOP saved ground. DAPPLESANDDIAMONDS became fractious and sat down in the gate, raced boxed at the rail on the opening turn, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole but faded through the backstretch and was eased in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Dapplesanddiamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious,sat in gate,boxed rail 1st turn,chased 7/16,eased lane

ENTRY.NAME: Letitgotovoicemail
ENTRY.OWNER: Red Shell Racing LLC Delancey Stable LLC and Angelinos Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: up near 3/4,rated pace,pressured 3/8,rail far turn,kept alert

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: David J. Lanzman Racing Inc & Jason W.Wood

ENTRY.NAME: Sideswiped
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked off rail,chased 3/8,3p far turn,settled 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 38700. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER SINCE AUGUST 9, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since J anuary 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISSIONSNINETYNINE tapered in and raced with the pace two deep, took over toward the nine sixteenths pole and was rated on the lead from that point, came under pressure past the three eighths, dueled clear of Auburn Mill midway on the far turn and was kept sharp down the lane. OUT OF CENTS raced off the rail on the opening turn, picked up the chase leaving the half mile pole and steadily improved through the backstretch, drew close in the three path of the far turn and cleared second mid-stretch. FREEDOM RIDER rounded the first turn off the rail, bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole and raced in the three path of the far turn, then dueled for third. BUFF'S EYE VIEW saved ground well off the early pace, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced near the rail on the far turn and was boxed at the rail leaving the turn, altered course mid-stretch but ran out of ground. AUBURN MILL set the early pace inside, was met toward the nine sixteenths pole and gave chase leaving the half mile pole, but dropped back at the rail midway on the far turn and weakened nearing mid-stretch. ALLEN CAN DO IT settled close in the three path on the first turn, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole but faded in the five path of the far turn. STRONG LIL KOKORO rounded the first turn about the three path, left the turn outside and faded through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Cents
ENTRY.OWNER: Coleswood Farm Inc and G L M Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Buff's Eye View
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 7/16,rail far turn,boxed into lane

ENTRY.NAME: Missionsninetynine
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Ronney W and Cefalu John
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace 2d,up near 9/16,pressured 3/8,clear mid turn,kept sharp

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 102. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36300. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since J anuary 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 9 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NICO stalked the early pace three wide then challenged into the backstretch, dueled for the nod three wide midway on the far turn and dug in determinedly to eke out the advantage over the game effort of SOCIAL CHIC, who stalked off the rail the first turn and took the lead into the backstretch, dug in to the challenges of Cowboy At Heart to his inside and Nico to the outside, was met midway through the far turn but dug in gamely to the finish. FANCY CONCHO rated close off the rail on the opening turn, picked up the chase approaching the five sixteenths pole but flattened stride toward mid-stretch. DEBIT CARD came in early then saved ground on the opening turn, picked up the chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail and passed rivals in the lane. COWBOY AT HEART moved to the inside and rated the pace, was met leaving the half mile pole and dueled from that point, but dropped back at the rail midway on the far turn and weakened in the lane. CASANOVA KITTEN was squeezed from early contention and rounded the first turn about the four path, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole but flattened in the four path of the far turn. INSIDE RISK steadied into the first turn, left the turn outside and gave chase toward the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn two deep and weakened into the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Debit Card
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in early,saved ground,chased 7/16,rail far turn,passed rvals

ENTRY.NAME: Cowboy At Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,met past 1/2,dueled,dropped back mid turn,weakn

ENTRY.NAME: Social Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked off rail,up past 1/2,met mid turn,gamely lane,ceded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 13300. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY MIRACLE MAN closed to the lead passing the thirteen sixteenths pole and moved to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure toward the three eighths, contested the edge nearest the rail on the far turn and dug in under steady encouragement to hold off BET ON BITZ, who rated close off the rail and gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, contested at a close disadvantage off the rail on the far turn and was outfinished in the duel through the stretch. PLAYBOY ROY saved ground off the pace, bid past the seven sixteenths pole and and rounded the far turn at the rail, was outfinished in the stretch duel for second but held on for third. MAKE THE WAY CLEAR rated close inside, bid nearing the three eighths pole and rounded the far turn about the three path, and finished evenly while gaining on third. GARITOFF rounded the first turn about the three path, gave chase into the backstretch but weakened off the rail on the far turn. LIGHTNING LAD raced well off the pace in the two and three paths the first turn, entered the backstretch outside, bid toward the three eighths pole and rounded the far turn about the six path. DOMINANT FACTOR saved ground racing well back, gave chase into the backstretch, rounded the far turn at the rail and ran evenly in the lane. GORUN entered the first turn about the six path, gave chase past the half mile pole then weakened in the four path of the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Make the Way Clear
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,bid 3/8,3p far turn,even finish,gaining on 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Playboy Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,bid past 7/16,rail far turn,outfinished,held on 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: My Miracle Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,rail far turn,held on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Three Races Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 9 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAR AWAY LOVE (ARG) rated the pace inside, came under pressure toward the five sixteenths pole, widened at the rail on the far turn and was kept alert in the lane. NAVY SWORD raced off the rail on the first turn, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the four and five paths, dug in leaving the turn and got up for second the final strides. SOMEDAY IS TODAY rated close inside on the first turn, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail, eased out into the lane and was nipped from second the final strides. GRACE'S SECRET saved ground on the first turn then eased out into the backstretch, picked up the chase toward the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn about the three path, angled to the outside approaching the head of the lane and passed rivals. SIRJUS DREAM stalked off the rail on the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and weakened into the lane. BOUNDTOBEOK stalked the early pace about the four path, gave chase into the backstretch, raced in the three path of the far turn and weakened in the lane. LACE REVOLUTION settled inside on the first turn, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole then flattened in the three path of the far turn. SWEET SPIN saved ground and showed little response through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Far Away Love (ARG)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 5/16,widened turn,kept alert lane

ENTRY.NAME: Someday Is Today
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,chased 7/16,rail far turn,nipped 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground early,chased 3/8,3p far turn,passed rivals outside

ENTRY.NAME: Navy Sword
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail,chsaed 7/16,4& 5p far turn,up 2nd final strides

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 9 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since December 9 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR CHANCE ROMANCE stalked the earlier pace from the two and three paths, took the lead toward the seven sixteenths pole and turned away In High Gear through the backstretch, rounded the far turn off the rail then dug in under steady handling to hold on. NEVERFOLD saved ground well off the pace on the first turn, bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the four path of the far turn, dueled for second mid-stretch, closed to the outside girth of the winner late yards but hung approaching the wire. LOGSTRADAMUS stalked in the four path the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole and raced close off the rail on the far turn, but flattened stride the final sixteenth. MARCHED rated close inside on the first turn, closed to a brief slim lead past the five sixteenths pole, was met and dropped back at the rail midway on the far turn and weakened in the lane. TWILIGHT YEARS exchanged contact with Hillbilly Rock leaving the gate and rounded the first turn in the four path, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn and showed little in the lane. IHEARTRAINACOMN saved ground off the pace, gave chase toward the three eighths pole, raced in the five path of the far turn and showed little in the lane. IN HIGH GEAR set the early pace inside, was met approaching the seven sixteenths pole and gave chase from that point, but faded off the rail on the far turn. HILLBILLY ROCK exchanged contact with Twilight Years and bobbled after the break, also made contact with Neverfold soon after the start then saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Marched
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,bid 3/8,brief lead past 5/16,met turn,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Iheartrainacomn
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased near 3/8,5p far turn,empty lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Chance Romance
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: In High Gear
ENTRY.COMMENT: set early pace inside,met near 7/16,chased,faded far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 13300. FOR MAIDENS, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHERRYS CROSS settled in the four and five paths the opening turn and raced wide into the backstretch, started a bid leaving the three eighths pole and steadily progressed to take the nod three wide midway on the far turn, dueled clear of SLOE GIN BIZ mid-stretch and widened the final sixteenth. The latter, stalked from the three path the first turn, bid nearing the three eighths pole and took a brief slim lead past the quarter pole, was met midway on the far turn, dueled close through the upper stretch but relented the final sixteenth. GANDHI'S ORION stalked the earlier pace from the two and three paths, picked up the chase approaching the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the three and four paths and came along for third later yards. DADDY Z tapered in and stalked the early pace two deep, took the lead into the backstretch and dueled clear of Steady Eddie approaching the five sixteenths pole, but was met at the rail passing the quarter pole and flattened into the lane. SMOOZER saved ground well off the pace on the first turn, gave chase toward the seven sixteenths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn and showed little in the lane. BROTHER MERLE gave up several lengths when he dwelled in the gate, saved ground racing well back but bid nearing the five sixteenths pole and improved his position. STEADY EDDIE set the early pace inside, was met leaving the first turn and dueled from that point, but dropped back approaching the five sixteenths pole and gave way at the rail. PLAYING GOLD saved ground on the first turn, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole but weakened off the rail on the far turn. OBOY rounded the first turn in the four and five paths, left the turn outside, faded through the backstretch, raced in the five path of the far turn and was eased in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Brother Merle
ENTRY.COMMENT: dwelt break,saved ground well back,bid 5/16,improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Steady Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside,met past 1/2,dueled,dropped back 5/16,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Smoozer
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 7/16,off rail far turn,empty lane
